name: Wobble Jump (PIndustries)
description:
A local 2 player platformer where you can jump with your wobbly ghost. Play against your friends and be the last one standing.

Current Modi:

  • Floor is Lava
  • more coming soon

Controls:

  • Player 1: a, d to move; space to jump
  • Player 2: left and right arrow to move; up arrow to jump

Please note that the game is still in a very early state of development and there will be a lot more content added in the future. The full screen mode is currently not supported. Sorry
